summary: This is a filing from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in the case United States v. Maxwell (20 CR. 330). It transmits the Government's opposition to defense motions and related redaction requests, including a letter and proposed redactions to an omnibus memorandum and an exhibit.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The individual who submitted the filing on behalf of the Government, opposing defense motions and proposing redactions in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Government Files Opposition and Redaction Requests
events.description: The Government filed its opposition to defense motions in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, along with a letter and proposed redactions to its legal memorandum and an exhibit.

keyFacts: The document is a filing in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell (20 CR. 330).
The Government is opposing defense motions and has submitted proposed redactions to its legal filings.
The filing includes a letter and proposed redactions to an omnibus memorandum and Exhibit 11.
It was submitted by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
